item.title: #001 | A Visual Guide To Sustainable Software Engineering
item.description: RESOURCES TO EXPLORE Start Here: Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering UNESCO: Sustainable Engineering Sustainable Software Blog Sustainability @Microsoft 2020 Sustainability Announcement 2020 Environmental Sustainability Report Cloud Adoption Framework: Sustainability Outcomes and Benefits Sustainable Software Engineering Principles in AKS What does Sustainability Mean? According to UNESCO, sustainable engineering is the process of using resources in a way that does not compromise the environment or deplete the materials for future generations.
